participant_1.name: Lila Thompson
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and introspective, often lost in deep reflections.
participant_1.background: i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i live in alaska. i like meditation. i am a buddhist.

participant_2.name: Maxwell Reed
participant_2.personality: quirky and eccentric, with a flair for the unconventional.
participant_2.background: i am a recluse. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am working on a building a robot to be my body double. i helped design the game starcraft. i've an allergy to water.
